content.raw:
Started laying the groundwork to add fuel-tools to CI:

* [release-tools PR](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/708/add-fuel-tools-and-sensors-to-ign-gazebo/diff) - still needs fuel-tools3 release
* [gazebodistro PR](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/12/add-ign-plugin-ign-fuel-tools-and-remove/diff) to add as a ign-gazebo dependency (fuel-tools still needs its own yaml file)
* [homebrew-simulation PR](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/551) - work in progress, needs ign-fuel-tools tag
* Pipelines in this PR
content.html:
Started laying the groundwork to add fuel-tools to CI:

  • release-tools PR - still needs fuel-tools3 release
  • gazebodistro PR to add as a ign-gazebo dependency (fuel-tools still needs its own yaml file)
  • homebrew-simulation PR - work in progress, needs ign-fuel-tools tag
  • Pipelines in this PR
